tit.cmt: 用語集にはMasaharu INABAとありましたが、ここでは「まさのり」とかな書きされているのでそちらに従いました。

sen.j: 稲葉 正発（いなば まさのり、享和元年9月21日 (旧暦)（1801年10月28日） - 文政6年6月21日 (旧暦)（1823年7月28日））は、山城国淀藩の第9代藩主。
sen.e: Masanori INABA (October 28, 1801-July 28, 1823) was the ninth lord of the Yodo domain of the Province of Yamashiro.
Masanori INABA (October 28, 1801 - July 28, 1823) was the ninth lord of the Yodo Domain of Yamashiro Province.
sen.cmt: スペース補足しました。Yodo Domain of Yamashiro Provinceに訂正しました。
sen.e: Masanori INABA (October 28, 1801 - July 28, 1823) was the ninth lord of the Yodo Domain of Yamashiro Province.
The thirteenth grand master of the Inaba family with ties to Masanari.
The thirteenth grand master of the Inaba family with ties to Masanari.
The thirteenth grand master of the Inaba family with ties to Masanari.

sen.j: 第8代藩主・稲葉正備の長男。
sen.e: The first son of Masanari INABA, the eighth lord of the domain.
The first son of Masanari INABA, the eighth lord of the domain.
The first son of Masanari INABA, the eighth lord of the domain.
His mother was the daughter of Masatomo ABE.
His mother was the daughter of Masatomo ABE.
His mother was the daughter of Masatomo ABE.
His lawful wife was the daughter of Toyokazu YAMAUCHI.
His lawful wife was the daughter of Toyokazu YAMAUCHI.
His lawful wife was the daughter of Toyokazu YAMAUCHI.

sen.j: 官位は従五位下、対馬国守。
sen.e: His official ranks were Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) and Tsushima no kuni no kami (governor of Tsushima Province)
His official ranks were Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) and Tsushima no kuni no kami (governor of Tsushima Province).
sen.cmt: ピリオド補足しました。
sen.e: His official ranks were Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) and Tsushima no kuni no kami (governor of Tsushima Province).

sen.j: 享和元年（1801年）9月21日生まれ。
sen.e: He was born on September 21, 1801 (old lunar calendar).
He was born on October 28, 1801.
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ暦に訂正しました。(old lunar calendar)削除しました。
sen.e: He was born on October 28, 1801.
His childhood name was Sadanosuke.
His childhood name was Sadanosuke.
His childhood name was Sadanosuke.

sen.j: 文化 (元号)12年（1815年）、父の死去により後を継ぐ。
sen.e: He succeeded his father upon his death in 1815.
He succeeded his father upon his death in 1815.
He succeeded his father upon his death in 1815.

sen.j: 文政6年（1823年）6月21日に嗣子無くして23歳で若死にし、後を叔父の稲葉正守が継いだ。
sen.e: He died young at the age of 23 on June 21, 1823 (old lunar calendar) without an heir and his uncle Masamari INABA succeeded him.
He died young at the age of 23 on July 28, 1823 without an heir and his uncle Masamari INABA succeeded him.
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ暦に訂正しました。(old lunar calendar)削除しました。
sen.e: He died young at the age of 23 on July 28, 1823 without an heir and his uncle Masamari INABA succeeded him.
